title: Data Visualization Tool for Rural Roadways based on SPFs with speed and weather CMFs
description: This data visualization tool for rural roadways is based on safety performance functions (SPFs) considering speed and weather crash modification factors (CMFs). The map shows the entire rural roadway networks in the National Highway System. The color of the segments is based on the number of expected crashes on the individual segment. Below the interactive map, an interactive table produces the result of the final selection. This tool has functionality with location selection from the county, district, and different AADT ranges.

title: Data Visualization Tool for Rural Roadways
description: This data visualization tool for rural roadways is based on safety performance functions (SPFs) considering speed and weather crash modification factors (CMFs) using data from Washington and Ohio. The color of the segments is based on the number of expected crashes on the individual segment. Below the interactive map, an interactive table produces the results of the final selection. The interactive table can display 10, 25, 50, or 100 entries using the drop-down menu to the left. The SPFs developed in this project considered traffic volume, roadway geometry, and traffic crashes.

title: Data Visualization Tool for Non-motorist Exposure Estimates
description: The GIS web tool provides estimates of pedestrian and bike commute trips by different Census spatial units (from tracts to block group). This tool also has the functionality of data downloading and data display in interactive data table format.

title: Short-Duration Operation Speed Measures for Interstate Roadways
description: This tool visualizes speed and traffic data for the TxDOT 0-7131 Project. Users can filter by parameters such as District, County, Year, and Season to analyze traffic speeds, congestion, and other metrics on selected roadways.

title: Granular Level Precipitation Data
description: This tool provides an overview of precipitation data from 2019 to 2022. Users can filter data by County, Year, Month, Day, and Hour to view precipitation patterns on a map and in a table format.

title: Multi-Modal Driveway Density Comparison Tool
description: This tool allows users to compare driveway densities by different classifications (e.g., major residential, major commercial). It provides interactive maps and tables that display driveway data for selected TxDOT districts and classification types.

title: Smart Location Database (SLD) Driveway Density Tool
description: This tool allows users to analyze driveway density data by setting specific thresholds for variables such as employment, residential classification, and commercial/industrial sectors. The results are visualized on a map and presented in table format for further analysis.

title: Safe Route User Interface
description: This tool provides route directions between two points (e.g., from Texas State University to University of Texas) and assigns a combined safety score for each route based on various factors. Users can view the safest and fastest routes on the map.

title: AI-Driven Safe Navigation Tool
description: This tool provides safe and fast route recommendations between two points (e.g., Texas State University to University of Texas). It compares the crash score, distance, duration, and other factors for both the fastest and safest routes.

title: SSA Scoring Tool
description: A GIS-based safety analysis platform designed to help visualize and analyze roadway safety metrics. It allows users to explore different road segments, view key data like traffic volume and safety scores, and even check the real-world view of the segment through Google Street View integration.

title: CRIS Data Application
description: A tool that allows users to filter crash data by parameters such as Crash Hour and Crash Severity. The filtered results can be downloaded, and detailed crash information is displayed in the table format and can be downloaded by the user.

title: FARSTool Application
description: FARSTool provides an overview of Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS) data from 2016-2021 across all U.S. states. Users can filter by state, year, and variables such as day of the week to analyze traffic fatality data.

title: NCHRP 17-85 QIE Tool (Replication Approach)
description: This tool allows users to upload roadway and driver files for Quantitative Intersection Evaluation (QIE). Once the files are uploaded, the tool generates QIE variables that can be downloaded and processed.

title: Inset Street View Tool
description: This tool visualizes crash data on a map using color-coded markers based on Collision Type. It allows users to click on circle markers to see specific crash details such as location, crash severity, weather, and lighting conditions. The tool integrates with Google Street View and Mapbox to provide visual context of the crash location.

title: Inset Map Tool
description: A visualization tool that differentiates between autonomous and conventional vehicle crashes using a color-coded map. Clicking on the map provides details on the Pre-Crash Mode for specific locations.

title: SSA Scoring Tool (Travis County)
description: This interactive tool shows SSA score on roadway segments in Travis.

title: Texas Crash Insights Tool
description: This tool displays location of crashes in Texas during 2017-2022. This interactive tool provides locations with color codes based on different variable attributes.

title: Texas Shared Use Path (SUP) Tool
description: This tool (developed as part of TxDOT 0-7189 project) displays crash locations associated with SUPs.  The color of the circles are based on non-motorist exposures. Clicking on the points will display the Google StreetView.

title: Farm Equipment
description: The Farm Equipment Crash Map visualizes crash incidents involving farm equipment across Texas, integrating road type, weather conditions, and crash distribution data. 🚜 Users can filter crashes based on weather conditions, road classifications etc, helping to identify trends and improve rural road safety. 🌾🚦

title: NCHRP 17-113: Safe System Approach
description: This is searchable electronic toolkit that builds on the NCHRP Report 500 series to align with Safe System Approach (SSA) principles and AASHTO's current priorities, as well as reflect the most recent research and identify new innovations to help achieve the goal of zero deaths on the nation's roads.

title: Google Scholar Scraper
description: This project automatically scrapes publication data and metadata from an author's Google Scholar profile. The scraper is currently configured to scrape and update the data of Dr. Subhasish Das on a daily basis, saving the results to the JSON file scholar-data-qK-YgxAAAAAJ.json.

title: American Public Transportation Association
description: This is an online searchable database from the American Public Transportation Association (APTA) that allows users to explore research articles, reports, and studies related to public transit, multimodal transportation, micromobility, and behavioral impacts using categorized filters.

title: Texas Roundabouts
description: Texas Roundabouts is an interactive mapping tool showcasing roundabout locations across Texas, using TxDOT's database. 🔄 Users can click on a roundabout to instantly view StreetView imagery and key intersection details, improving roadway navigation and planning! 🚦

title: TxDOT 26-021: Nature Based Solutions Demo Tool
description: Transportation systems and facilities face challenges and impacts from extreme weather, changes in precipitation, sea level rise, and storm surge. There have been many discussions including the Statewide Resiliency Plan that identify the stressors and provide a summary of solutions to help bolster system resiliency; however, nature-based solutions is a tool and methodology that has little awareness at TxDOT and limited use. Currently, TxDOT does not have guidelines for implementing nature-based solutions

title: NCHRP 08-185: Advancing TSMO Knowledge Management with Generative AI
description: The objective of this research is to explore gen AI's potential for enhancing knowledge management at transportation agencies by (1) developing a scalable framework to use gen AI tools for improved knowledge management, (2) designing a trustworthy human-AI collaboration prototype that leverages DOTs' resources to address common transportation systems management and operations (TSMO) scenarios within the established framework, and (3) implementing a pilot deploying the identified prototype to demonstrate its efficiency and effectiveness.

title: Texas Innovative Intersections
description: Texas Innovative Intersections is an interactive mapping tool using TxDOT's database to visualize advanced intersection designs across the state. 🗺️ Users can click on locations to instantly access StreetView and key details, enhancing roadway planning and analysis! 🚦

title: Near Miss and Near Crash Safety related Web Resources
description: A web resource of near-miss/near-crash/near-collision studies

title: Innovative Intersection Web Resources
description: A web resource of innovative intersection studies

title: PM2.5 Web Resources
description: A web resource of PM2.5 studies

title: FRA-RS-005: Demo Tool
description: This interactive curriculum provides first responders with hands-on, scenario-based training that replicates the complexities of a passenger train accident, enabling them to practice real-time decision-making, communication, and coordination skills in a controlled environment.

title: Bluesky CLI Tool
description: Bluesky CLI is a command line application which can get the historical data from the bluesky social platform as well as the live posts with certain keywords.

title: #TRBAM Bluesky Posts Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics dashboard for tracking and visualizing #TRBAM posts from Bluesky. The dashboard provides insights into post metrics, engagement stats, contributor analysis, and content trends.

title: NCHRP 20-07/384: Demo Tool
description: Explore the groundbreaking research from NCHRP 20-07/384, providing actionable insights into the competencies needed for effective safety analysis in transportation systems.

title: Demo Tool NCHRP 23-46: AI Integration and Workforce Transformation for State DOTs
description: Explore innovative solutions to integrate AI and transform the workforce of state and local transportation agencies. This research outlines actionable strategies for AI adoption and workforce development.

title: NCHRP 08-189 Demo Tool
description: Evaluation of TSMO Strategies.

title: Texas Measles Outbreak (2025) Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard application for visualizing and analyzing measles outbreak data. This project provides public health officials, researchers, and the general public with up-to-date information on measles cases, vaccination rates, and outbreak predictions.
